Phrase: The Mist Train left the first station, passed through the Gate and continued on the Giant Tree Railway.
The Gate at the station was different from the one Mary had made, and was like the tunnels that the Mist Train usually passes through.

The pitch-black tunnel went straight on, a distance that would have crossed the border by now if this were a normal railway line. The air in the train was unusually heavy, and the Train Knights could feel the unease and faint fear in the air.
As soon as the Train started running, Putra joked, "We could go to the end of the world like this..." but she went quiet after that.
- but there is always an end to this railway line. Saying this, it was Mary who kept her eyes on the Giant Tree Route Map.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Conductor, I need you to slow down and get ready to stop. We should be able to see the station soon.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: How could you tell when it's pitch black and you can't see anything?

Name: Mary
Phrase: The Mist Train is reacting to the magic of the Giant Tree. This is a signal from the Giant Tree... No, from Ricardo.

Name: Putra
Phrase: You can see all that, Mary. You really are like a Divine Child of St. Iris.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I wish I were. If I were a Divine Child, I could have helped Ricardo so much more.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Let's not talk about that. We won't know how to save the Giant Tree until we meet Lady Ricardo. We are together with Conductor and the Mist Train. There must be a way. A way to save both the Giant Tree and Lady Ricardo.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I hope it's...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Mist Train, initializing slowdown. Train Knights, brace for potential impact.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Please, Ricardo. Please guide us...

Name: Putra
Phrase: Hey Vivienne, I've got one thing on my mind.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What is it? What's on your mind?

Name: Putra
Phrase: This place feels like a normal tunnel. But it's inside a Gate, isn't it? What happens if we stop in the wrong place?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Fair point. I mean, my impression is that we'll be thrown out of the exit like what's going on with the Gates, but if we stopped halfway, we could be trapped forever...

Name: Putra
Phrase: D-don't say something so scary, you're creeping me out~

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oh, so sorry, don't trust what I say as gospel. I just said it out of turn.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Yes, that's right! I shouldn't even worry about what you said!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Leave those difficult things to the smarties. You see, we're the type of people who use our brawns more than our brains.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino also realised one thing.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Oh~ speaking of smart girls~?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What did Yoshino, who is smart and actually strong, realise~?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The time it takes to slow down is too long. And the braking is intermittent.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I see.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: So what do you mean...?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It means the Mist Train is controlled by the railway. We may be guided to an exit somewhere.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Which means we're in good hands!

Name: Putra & Vivienne
Phrase: Thank goodness~!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa, the brakes don't work. What's going on...?

Name: Mary
Phrase: It's OK. Just keep slowing down, do not accelerate.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Yes! I trust you, Mary!

Name: Mary
Phrase: The brakes were timed perfectly. We should be able to keep going out of the Gate...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa! There's a light ahead! It's the exit to the tunnel!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: All hands to battle stations! Be ready for anything waiting outside the Gate!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Is this ...?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Looks like we're right next to the Giant Tree. It feels like we've come such a long way, but it looks like we're not even that far from the first station.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: I can see the Sea of Fog right behind us. We must have gone through that thick Mist.

Name: Mary
Phrase: There should be a station around here... but I don't see any.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That sound is...!

Name: Mary
Phrase: Calm down. It doesn't mean it's our enemy.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Welcome to the Giant Tree Railway.\nI am the guardian of the railway station.\nI have inherited the will of the Guardian of the Giant Tree.
At the end of the long tunnel, waiting for us is the Samantha who speaks human language...
